episodes.title: Will You Be Okay After Leaving A Cult?
episodes.description: For my people who have experienced narcissism, manipulation, gaslighting, and love bombing from joining a cult. Don't be afraid. Don't be afraid to start over. You survived something so incredibly traumatic. I'm happy you are alive. I'm happy you are here. "What happened happened couldn't have happened any other way because it didn't." -Peter Crone Please share, subscribe, and rate my podcast. This will get the word out to people who need to hear this message. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. <3 My social media accounts 📲❤️ ⁠⁠ ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Blain’s Instagram⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Podcast Instagram⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Linktree⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ ⁠⁠ ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠LTK⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ ⁠⁠ ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠TikTok⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠YouTube⁠⁠⁠

episodes.title: Cult Mind Control
episodes.description:
What does mind control really look like inside a cult? In this raw and revealing episode, I unpack the psychological tactics used to suppress your identity, silence your intuition, and hijack your thoughts. I share my own experience in a high-control group, how I began to break free, and how I’m rebuilding my voice and mind. If you’ve ever questioned your reality, this one’s definitely for you.
Thank you for tuning in. I'm so happy to have you here 3 
🔗 Show Notes & Resources:
Steven Hassan – BITE Model of Authoritarian Control. Learn how cults manipulate behavior, information, thoughts, and emotions.Podcast Recommendation: IndoctriNation with Rachel Bernstein. Explores cults, mind control, and coercive influence with survivor stories.Therapy Resource: Psychology Today Therapist FinderInner Child Healing Book: Homecoming: Reclaiming and Championing Your Inner Child by John BradshawMy social media accounts 📲❤️
